  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountFragment
    The AccountFragment class handles the user interface for viewing and editing account details.
    AdminAndUserFragment
    AdminAndUserFragment class represents a fragment for a user who is an admin and some other user type.
    AdminEventFragment
    A fragment to display a given event's information.
    AdminFacilityFragment
    A fragment to display a given facility's information.
    AdminProfileFragment
    A fragment to display a given profile's information.
    BrowseEventsFragment
    BrowseEventsFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all events in the application.
    BrowseFacilitiesFragment
    BrowseFacilitiesFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all facilities in the application.
    BrowseProfilesFragment
    BrowseProfilesFragment class represents a fragment for the admin to browse all profiles in the application.
    CameraFragment
    CameraFragment class represents a fragment that provides camera functionality within the application.
    CancelledListFragment
    CancelledListFragment class represents a fragment that displays a list of users who have canceled their participation in a specific event.
    CancelledListProfileFragment
    A fragment to display and manage a user's profile information.
    CreateAccountFragment
    The CreateAccountFragment class handles creating user account when trying to join an event without an account
    CustomNotificationFragment
    Fragment for sending custom notifications to users based on their status.
    EnrolledListFragment
    EnrolledListFragment class represents a fragment for viewing user profiles enrolled in a specific event.
    EnrolledListProfileFragment
    EnrolledListProfileFragment class represents a fragment for viewing detailed information about an enrolled user.
    EventFragment
    Fragment for displaying and editing details of an event.
    FacilityFragment
    FacilityFragment class manages the facility details of the user in the application.
    HomeFragment
    HomeFragment class displays the user's events and allows the user to add new events.
    JoinedEventsFragment
    JoinedEventsFragment class displays the events that the user has joined and allows interaction with them.
    JoinEventFragment
    Fragment that allows users to join or unjoin an event.
    MapFragment
    A Fragment that displays a map with coordinates from Firestore sign-ups.
    OrganizerEventFragment
    OrganizerEventFragment inflates the screen for organizers to manage a specific event of theirs.
    QrFragment
    QrFragment is a fragment class that displays a QR code image.
    WaitingListFragment
    A fragment that displays a list of users who are waiting for an event.
    WaitingListProfileFragment
    A fragment that displays the profile details of a user who is waiting for an event, including their name, email, phone, roles, and profile image.
    WinnerListFragment
    A fragment that displays the list of winners for a specific event.
    WinnerListProfileFragment
    A fragment to display a given profile's information.
